Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Bay Ridge 5th Avenue business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Bay Ridge 5th Avenue Business Improvement District, Brooklyn

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the Bay Ridge 5th Avenue business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Bay Ridge 5th Avenue Business Improvement District, Brooklyn

Items.Title: Roll Call
A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a retiree health benefits trust fund.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a retiree health benefits trust fund.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at 1.5% per annum for Fiscal Year 2007.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at 1.5% per annum for FY'07.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass Assembly Bill 7577 and Senate Bill 4795-A which would exempt contributions made by an employer to an accident or health plan for the benefit of an employee’s domestic partner from State and City taxes.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Exempt contributions made by an employer to an accident or health plan for the benefit of an employee’s domestic partner from State and City taxes.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for Fiscal Year 2007 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $80,000, or not more than $80,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 9% per annum for FY'07 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $80,000, or not more than $80,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be 18% per annum for Fiscal Year 2007 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of over $80,000, or over $80,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 18% per annum for FY'07 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of over $80,000, or over $80,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2007 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents be 18% per annum for real property where the assessed value is over $80,000, or over $80,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments; and 9% per annum for real property where the assessed value is not more than $80,000, or not more $80,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate to be charged for FY'07 for non-payment of water rents and sewer rents.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for prepayment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2007, pursuant to the City Charter.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYC Banking Commission - transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for prepayment of real estate taxes for FY'07.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for Fiscal Year 2007 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Communication was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: NYC Banking Commission - Transmitting recommendations of the interest rate to be charged for FY'07 for non-payment of taxes on real estate, and for non-payment of water and sewer rents.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a retiree health benefits trust fund.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a retiree health benefits trust fund.

Items.Title: Communication from the New York City Banking Commission - transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for prepayment of real estate taxes for Fiscal Year 2007, pursuant to the City Charter.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Communication be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: NYC Banking Commission - transmitting recommendation of the discount rate to be allowed for prepayment of real estate taxes for FY'07.
